snippet: City Room received nearly 200 responses to a request for stories of street harassment in New York City. Read a sampling, as well as a listing of events planned for “International Anti-Street Harassment Week.”
abstract: City Room received nearly 200 responses to a request for stories of street harassment in New York City. Read a sampling, as well as a listing of events planned for “International Anti-Street Harassment Week.”

headline.main: Addressing Harassment on the Streets and Subways of New York City
